description:
Snowboots in infant sizes, for small members taking their first baby steps into winter. They'll keep your little ones wonderfully warm. Easy to get on (and keep on) squirmy little feet.

  • Uppers are quilted nylon, with faux fur linings for warmth and comfort
  • Easy-fit, extra wide gaiter openings let you slide baby’s feet in with relative ease
  • Adjustable elastic Velcro® strap provides a snug, stay-on fit
  • Waterproof, flexible synthetic rubber lower shell. (Note: the boot is not waterproof above lower shell line.)
  • Midsoles and outsoles are synthetic rubber, lugged for traction when the explorer starts walking
  • Manufacturer's active temperature rating is -23°C
name: Kamik Snowbug Winter Boots - Infants
